rawText:
CONTACT INFORMATION
David Kaniaru Kamau
dkamale@gmail.com
254-723-7277

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
IT leader with 16+ years in designing and managing secure, scalable infrastructure across finance, telecom, and humanitarian sectors. Expertise in multi-country IT operations, cloud-first strategies (AWS, Azure), cybersecurity, and enterprise network optimization. Skilled in aligning technology with business goals while overseeing large teams and budgets. Currently pursuing AWS Solutions Architect – Professional and planning CISSP (Q1 2026).

CORE COMPETENCIES
IT Strategy & Governance (ISO 27001, NIST, ITIL v4), Cloud & Infrastructure (AWS, Azure, Hybrid Environments), Cybersecurity (SIEM, NGFW, Incident Response, BCP/DR), Network Architecture (MPLS, SD-WAN, Fortinet, Meraki, QoS), Call Centre & Voice (Omnichannel CX, VoIP, SIP, IVR, CRM), Project & Service Delivery (Agile, CI/CD, SLA/KPI Ownership), Vendor & Contract Management (ISPs, MNOs, SaaS, Licensing), Budgeting & Cost Optimization (OPEX/CAPEX Planning), People Leadership (Team Building, Career Pathing, Mentorship)

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Regional Head of Client Services & Projects
Echotel International | Jul 2025 - Present
Head of Client Services & Projects Echotel International | Jul 2025 – Present
• Led IT service and project delivery in Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Ghana, Namibia, and one additional country.

IVR, and digital channels—boosted CSAT and NPS scores.

African Banking Corporation | Aug 2013 - Nov 2020
• Managed enterprise infrastructure and user support, achieving 99.99% system uptime across all branches.
• Migrated 450 users from Microsoft Exchange to Google Workspace, increasing email system availability.
• Enhanced infrastructure security with McAfee EPO, Web Application Firewalls, and SIEM implementation.
• Decreased annual WAN expenses by $20,000 by consolidating vendors and renegotiating contracts.
• Led Disaster Recovery Site deployment, saving $8,000 in capital expenditures.
• Conducted skills gap analysis and training, aligning team roles with career development paths.
Technical Support Team Leader
Safran Morpho (IEBC) | Nov 2012 - Jul 2013
• Maintained 99% uptime for the nationwide biometric voter registration system in Kenya during 2013.
election cycle.
• Managed server, storage, and network operations; supervised L1 support team, improving efficiency by 15%.

status thereby unlocking upto 40% in vendor discounts

• Conducted instructor-led training on CCNA, CCNP, A+, N+, and ICDL to over 2,000 learners across 3 years.
• Recognized as Best Cisco Trainer in 2007 and 2008.

• Recognized as Best Cisco Trainer in 2007 and 2008.

CERTIFICATIONS
• AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate
• Pursuing AWS Certified Solutions Architect Professional
• Microsoft Azure Fundamentals Certification
• Cisco CCNP, CCNA, CCDA Certifications
• ITIL Foundation Certification
• Red Hat Certified System Administrator
• Microsoft Certified Solutions Associate (MCSA)
• Project Management and Customer Service Skills
• Plan to Obtain CISSP Certification by Q1 2026

SELECTED ACHIEVEMENTS
• Implemented infrastructure monitoring systems, reducing IT incident resolution time by 20%.
• Enhanced WAN uptime from 93% to 99% through managed WAN services.
TECHNICAL TOOLS & STACK
• Implemented cloud solutions using AWS, Azure, and Google Workspace.
• Managed networking technologies including MPLS, SD-WAN, FortiGate, Meraki, VPN, and BGP.
• Enhanced security protocols with McAfee ePO, WAF, SIEM, adhering to ISO 27001 and NIST standards, and developed DR/BCP strategies.
• Utilized Monday.com, Helpdesk Systems, and Remote Access Tools for effective monitoring and support.
• Gained foundational knowledge in Automation and DevOps with Terraform, CI/CD concepts, and Python scripting.
• Integrated CX platforms Connex1 and Zoho Desk for omnichannel support, including CRM, WhatsApp, and IVR systems.
